attributes.action: exclude land and property forming a pensioners home from the assessment of assets when calculating assistance with payment for essential residential or nursing care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The elderly were promised a welfare state with security from cradle to grave and have paid for this throughout their lives in Income Tax, National Insurance and Local Taxation. Many fought in the 2nd World War for these principles. Those who have worked hard and scrimped and saved to maintain their independence are penalised by a system that seeks to deprive them of their assets; some  who have made no attempt to manage their finances benefit from financial assistance. 
Most wish to bequeath their property to their children and it is to the benefit of the country that these assets are passed down. 
The government should acknowledge its responsibility to provide care for those who can no longer manage an independent life.
